description: Replace standard json module with openstack.common.jsonutils

comments.content:
Replace standard json module with openstack.common.jsonutils

Add json.load wrapper to openstack.common.jsonutils

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/8097
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Just a remark: 

a bug differs from a commit message because it provides long-term reference for the WHY of a change rather than the WHAT. A bug is a problem description, complete with symptoms. A change (and the attached commit message) describe how you fixes it.

Your bug descriptions look a lot like a commit message, they describe the change you push rather than the problem it solves. It would be good to improve that in the future. Thanks!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
Thanks Thierry,

That was something that was confusing me. I'll be more careful in the
future.

Cherrs,
LZY
